ProjectTitle: Fishing for regulators of neuronal repair in the degenerating central nervous system of the fast-aging Killifish
InitialFeedbackHistory:
30/06/2022
Please note that the right part of your table is missing
2. Data: You don't have to mention your own manuscripts in a DMP
4. Metadata: The link that you give for metadata for genomics goes to the PATRIC standard for bacterial genomes, since you describe under 6 that you plan to submit to EBI-ENA/NCBI-SRA better to use their standards. For microscopy can can have a look at OME (https://fairsharing.org/FAIRsharing.cq8tg2).
